title: Top later, want to join bronze/silver team
body:
I main top and Im sick of getting last pick and not getting to play top in ranked so i want to join a team.
Happy to use and chatting software.

Champs: {{champion:114}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:24}} Learning:{{champion:92}} {{champion:420}} 

Add me: aidan7787

replies.body: Hey mate, the team I am in is looking for a top laner, we are majority silver with a plat player as well. Add me (Awsumlad) or Aus Dave and tell him I directed you to him. We can play some games together and see how we go :) normally on around 7.30pm until 10pm
